item.title: I, Pencil
item.description: I think I heard about it first in a ted talk but didn’t really bother myself to read the actual essay, but after watching this video by Milton Friedman, I just had to read I, Pencil by Leonard E. Read. I tried to summarize it for myself, thought I will share here - Concluding paragraph of the essay is just too difficult to summarize, so adding it here as-is with my highlights -
